revised_title: On the Instability of the Pear-Shaped Figure of Equilibrium of a Rotating Mass of Liquid
tldr: The author investigates the stability of the pear-shaped figure of equilibrium in a rotating mass of liquid. They calculate the potential of a distorted ellipsoid and find that the pear-shaped figure is unstable. This research contributes to understanding the behavior of rotating liquid masses and their equilibrium shapes.
